overview: Famous romance novelist, Kate, is frustrated with her work. Searching for her animalistic edge, she takes a vacation with Paul, Natasha (Anka Romensky – Play boy February 2002 Centerfold), and Kevin (Hardy-Ames Hill – TV’s “Big Brother II”), to the electrifying city of Miami. the group’s partying gets out of control as Kate begins to enter a realm that she has written about but has always been afraid of. Torn between fear and desire, all of the taboos are broken in this tale of wicked sins and betrayal.
tagline: When Innocence Ends, Wants Become Needs.
title: Summer Desire
